CustomField.description: The number of Duplicate Record Sets merged by a Merge Job Batch in the 1-100 range. A high number reduces the consumption of the asynchronous transaction platform limit. A lower number increases concurrency and allows more complex Merge Rules. The default value is 10.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The number of Duplicate Record Sets merged by a Merge Job Batch in the 1-100 range. A high number reduces the consumption of the asynchronous transaction platform limit. A lower number increases concurrency and allows more complex Merge Rules. The default value is 10.
CustomField.label: Duplicate Record Sets Per Job Batch
